We have great Campus safety. excellent
I would love to be on campus everyday all day if i could.
I will i could join all clubs!!! Great !!!
The best thing to do for fun in Cypress College is to sit next to the pond and just relax and talk to fellow students.
Cypress College is an amazing College to attend. The staff is great and very helpful. The professors are outstanding and are willing to go above and beyond to help you be successful.
pageTitle: Cypress College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {77149=Although there are no dorms at Cypress College, apartments nearby are very affordable. Houses on Orange Street average two bedrooms with rent under $1000/month., 243057=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 228613=The campus is pretty safe. I have been there three years and have never felt unsafe. I have taken several night classes that end as late as 10:30 pm and have never felt like I was in danger. This is due to the several security guards that walk/drive around the campus constantly and will answer your call promptly if you call them. There is also security cameras installed in the buildings. Campus security will also offer to walk you to your car if you ever feel unsafe.}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here The administrative part can be a bit frustrating at times, but I love it at Cypress. Am learning a lot I really like all of my classes, and I can tell my teachers really know a lot about their subjects. Mark Majarian, my theatre professor, really tries to push you to be the best student you can. Login to rate or flag the reviews Hayley from Anaheim, CA 10/30/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 62 Categories Comments Great for these types of students -Students who want to save money -Students looking for a dental program (apply early it is wait list!) -students who want to experience a wide variety of classes before picking a major -Students with majors can take classes to transfer for cheaper Tips for prospective students -Sign up for classes the
